item.title: Leica EM KMR
item.description: The Leica EM KMR glass knife maker produces 45˚ glass knives from 6.4 and 8 mm thick glass.

item.title: Leica EM STAIN
item.description: This stainer automatically stain ultra-thin sections. By staining up to 25 grids simultaneously, the EM Stain both speeds up laboratory routines and eliminates the many tedious and time consuming tasks associated with traditional staining methods.

item.title: Leica UC6
item.description: The ultramicrotome UC6 is equipped with digital interface for custom control. This ultramicrotome is designed for cutting ultra-thin sections (<100nm) of sample embedded in resin, using glass or diamond (Diatome, Switzerland) knives.

item.title: Philips/FEI CM12 TEM
item.description: The CM 12 is transmission electron microscope, 120kV, with maximum tilt angle of ±60°. The microscope is designed for routinely imaging of biological and material specimens. It’s equipped with SIS MegaView III CCD digital camera (Olympus Soft Imaging Solutions; funded by MNTR, Project No. 143050)
